=Java Syntax Highlighter=

<wiki:toc max_depth="3" />

==Overview==
This is a syntax highlighter written in Java ([http://java-syntax-highlighter.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/javadoc/index.html JavaDoc]). It is ported from JavaScript [http://alexgorbatchev.com/SyntaxHighlighter/ SyntaxHighlighter], the current version ported is 3.0.83. If you need an editor more than a highlighter, please find [http://code.google.com/p/jsyntaxpane/ jsyntaxpane]. You may wondoer why I will port this to Java, it is because I need it for [http://code.google.com/p/language-files-tool/ Language Files Tool].

==Alternatives==
[http://java-prettify.googlecode.com Java Prettify]

==Requirement==
Java SE 6 or up

==Language Supported (Brushes)==
ActionScript3, Bash/shell, ColdFusion, C#, C++, CSS, Delphi, Diff, Erlang, Groovy, JavaScript, Java, JavaFX, Perl, PHP, Plain Text, PowerShell, Python, Ruby, Scala, SQL, Visual Basic, XML

http://alexgorbatchev.com/SyntaxHighlighter/manual/brushes/

==Themes==
Default, Django, Eclipse, Emacs, Fade To Grey, MD Ultra, Midnight, RDark<br />
[http://code.google.com/p/java-syntax-highlighter/wiki/ThemesDemo Click here to visit the gallery.]

==Configurations==
 * Allows you to change the first (starting) line number.
 * Allows you to turn gutter with line numbers on and off.
 * Allows you to highlight one or more lines to focus user's attention.
 * Allows you to highlight a mixture of HTML/XML code and a script which is very common in web development.
[http://code.google.com/p/java-syntax-highlighter/wiki/ConfigurationsDemo Click here for a demo.]

==Example==
*<font color="red">Note that this highlighter extends Swing component, so all operations are better be executed inside [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Event_dispatching_thread Swing dispatching thread].</font>*
{{{
import java.io.*;
import java.util.Arrays;
import java.util.logging.*;
import javax.swing.*;
import syntaxhighlighter.brush.*;
import syntaxhighlighter.SyntaxHighlighter;
import syntaxhighlighter.theme.ThemeRDark;

public class Example {

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        SwingUtilities.invokeLater(new Runnable() {

            @Override
            public void run() {
                try {
                    SyntaxHighlighter highlighter = new SyntaxHighlighter(new BrushXml(), new ThemeRDark());
                    highlighter.setHtmlScript(true);
                    highlighter.setHTMLScriptBrush(Arrays.asList(new BrushCss(), new BrushJScript(), new BrushPhp()));
                    highlighter.setContent(new File("test.html"));
                    highlighter.setFirstLine(10);
                    highlighter.setHighlightedLineList(Arrays.asList(10, 13));

                    JFrame frame = new JFrame();
                    frame.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.EXIT_ON_CLOSE);
                    frame.setContentPane(highlighter);
                    frame.pack();
                    frame.setLocationByPlatform(true);
                    frame.setVisible(true);
                } catch (Exception ex) {
                    Logger.getLogger(Example.class.getName()).log(Level.SEVERE, null, ex);
                }
            }
        });
    }
}
}}}
